text: Kasone, ki [ʙo mondan dar sarzamini kufr] nisʙat ʙa xes sitamgor ʙudand, [vaqte] faristagon conasonro megirand, [ʙa onon] megujand: "Dar ci [hol] ʙuded"? Posux medihand: "Mo dar zamin az sitamdidagon ʙudem". [Faristagon] Megujand: "Ojo zamini Alloh taolo gusturda naʙud, to dar on muhocirat kuned [va imonatonro hifz namoed]"? Pas, cojgohason duzax ast va ci ʙad sarancomest
